name: Hotcocoa
body:
### Getting Started

```
sudo macgem install hotcocoa
hotcocoa myApp
cd myApp && rake run
```

HotCocoa is built on top of Cocoa, so your best friends will be the Cocoa documentation and HotCocoa's own documentation.

### Contribute

Contributing to HotCocoa is fun and easy.

1. Clone the repo
2. Make changes
3. Open a pull request

### Communicate

- On [Github](http://github.com/HotCocoa/hotcocoa)
- Freenode IRC: #macruby
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
